name: RTL to GDSII Implementation of PicoRV32 (RISC-V)
desc: Implemented PicoRV32 RISC-V core from RTL to tapeout-ready GDSII using Cadence.

name: Analog IC Design (Op-Amps & Amplifiers)
desc: Designed and simulated operational amplifiers and amplifier circuits, meeting gain specifications within 5% tolerance.

name: LM741 Operational Amplifier Design Using Cadence Virtuoso
desc: Designed the LM741 operational amplifier in Cadence Virtuoso with emphasis on gain, frequency response, and stability

name: 6T SRAM Cell Design (90nm CMOS)
desc: Designed a high-performance 6T SRAM memory/write margin analysis, PVT corner checks, and post-layout simulations.

name: Digital VLSI & FPGA Post-Processing for QKD
desc: Implemented Verilog blocks for a real-time QKD pipeline, focusing on Sifting & Privacy Amplification.

name: Combinational Circuit Design & Implementation
desc: Developed a library of 30+ combinational logic and arithmetic circuits, including multiplexers, subtractors, and decoders, using 90 nm CMOS technology.

name: Sequential Circuits Design & Implementation
desc: Designed and implemented sequential circuits including flip-flops, latches, registers, and counters using CMOS logic.

name: 50 Days of Cadence: Digital & Analog Circuit Design Practice
desc: Daily practice of digital and analog circuit design using Cadence tools, documented over 50 days on LinkedIn

name: AI-Based Blind Stick for Image Detection
desc: Developed a device that detects object distance and produces alarm sounds when nearing an object. It also speaks the object's name to the user.
